description: Catenates (composes) 3D warps defined on a grid or via a matrix.

interpolation.title: Interpolation Mode
interpolation.description: Interpolation mode: linear, quintic, or wsinc5 (default).

verbosity.title: Verbosity Flag
verbosity.description: Print various fun messages during execution.

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: Prefix name for the output dataset that holds the warp.

space_marker.title: Space Marker
space_marker.description: Attach string 'sss' to the output dataset as its atlas space marker.

invert_final_warp.title: Invert Final Warp Flag
invert_final_warp.description: Invert the final warp before output.

extra_padding.title: Extra Padding
extra_padding.description: Pad the nonlinear warps by 'PP' voxels in all directions.
